remark.ch: 建議須修通過電磁學Ⅰ、電磁學Ⅱ、限電機三四年級及通訊三四年級

goal.en: Students will learn the practical aspects of electromagnetics.
goal.ch: 使大學部學生對電磁學具有實際應用概念

content.en:
"◎Power meter and attenuator
-Discussions on Ethics for Engineers
-Power meter
-Attenuator
-S-parameters
-Transmission line
◎Network analyzer
-S-parameters
-Smith chart
-Passive components
-Active components
◎Rectangular waveguide
-Waveguide
-Directional coupler
-Magic-T
-Cavity
◎Impedance match
-Measurement
-EDA tool simulation
-PCB fabrication
-Single-section match
◎Wireless communication
-Satellite communication
-Broadcast
-Wireless LNA
-Mobile communication"

en: Department:Department of Electrical Engineering、Department of Communication Engineering、Interdisciplinary Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
Department:Double Major-Department of Electrical Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限電機工程學系、通訊工程學系、資訊電機學院學士班。年級:限三年級、四年級。
系所:限雙主修-電機工程學系。
